sentences.sentence: He took these cells and injected them back in to the ear into the otic vesicle.
sentences.translation: 他提取出这些细胞，然后注射到耳部泡囊中。

sentences.sentence: At this time, excitement and fatigue run side-by-side, and art becomes hy otic.
sentences.translation: 在这个时候，兴奋和疲劳同时产生，艺术可能是催眠的。

sentences.sentence: To economize on runing water, earth, power, raw materials, grains and otic resources.
sentences.translation: 节水、 节地、 节能、 节材、 节粮以及节约更多有联系各种资料库。
